ORDER
PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
705 A.2d 1301
PHILADELPHIA NEWSPAPERS, INC., Publisher of The Philadelphia Inquirer, Appellant, v. HAVERFORD TOWNSHIP, Haverford Township Police Department, Gary E. Hoover and Charles Brooks.
